assessment_item.subject: Botany
assessment_item.title: LCMMQK-Q19-விதை முளைத்தலை தாமதப்படுத்துவது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

விதை முளைத்தலை தாமதப்படுத்துவது? 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

நீர் மற்றும் O_2  பற்றாக்குறை    

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4670"},{"text":"

விதையுறையுனுள் நீர் செல்லாமை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4671"},{"text":"

விதை வெளிஉறை கடினத்தன்மை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4681"},{"text":"

இவை அனைத்தும்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4686"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LCMMQK-Q19-விதை முளைத்தலை தாமதப்படுத்துவது?","title":"LCMMQK-Q19-விதை முளைத்தலை தாமதப்படுத்துவது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
